name: Down in Earth (burt1e)
description:
Robots have long overtaken the earth  and started adapting to human rituals like funerals. You are one of the last remaining humans trying to  salvage old circuits from bots left to rust Down in Earth.

This is a room-scale virtual reality game where you dig into robot graves to salvage their circuits.

It was built solo as game for the 5th epic mega jam within 48hours
